    • Method Detail

      • getLatestPolicyPeriod

        PolicyPeriod getLatestPolicyPeriod()
        Returns the latest policy period for this policy, where the latest policy period is defined as that policy period with the highest renewal number. If two policy periods tie with the highest renewal number, then the policy period with the highest mod number is returned.
        Returns:
        the latest policy period for this policy

      • getNumberAndLOB

        java.lang.String getNumberAndLOB()
        Returns:
        a formatted display key including the policy number and LOB. The policy number is gleaned from the first policy.

      • getOrderedPolicyPeriods

        PolicyPeriod[] getOrderedPolicyPeriods()
        Returns:
        the policy's periods, ordered by renewal number.

      • getDesignatedUnappliedFund

        UnappliedFund getDesignatedUnappliedFund(Account account)
        The designated UnappliedFund for this policy with the given account owner
